data.text: @ourworldisfuckd @swanblack404 Couldn't agree more. Tried to tell her, won't listen I'm afraid. Not my choice sadly.

@MarcusS53441297 @davidstannard1 @swanblack404 If your attitude is to not comfort your children when they're sick and frightened, out of fear of getting sick yourself, then I suggest not having children tbh.

You're not even a parent yet to make such judgements on this.
@helenjaneadkins @davidstannard1 @swanblack404 I'm 19 btw. Maybe I'll learn to be a good parent in the future if I ever have kids. 🙏✌️

@MarcusS53441297 @davidstannard1 @swanblack404 I ain't your mate you patronising prick.

Normal people comfort their children, infected with a virus or not.

@MarcusS53441297 @davidstannard1 @swanblack404 It's a mild virus for most people!

Take your scaremongering bullshit somewhere else.

@helenjaneadkins @davidstannard1 @swanblack404 "I couldn't give a toss what's making them sick"

It's probably best you just stop talking mate your embarrassing yourself.

@CaKw777 @swanblack404 My mother is 82, we never stopped visiting and hugs at all over the last 2 years. No masks, jabs or rules followed and non of us are dead or required any treatment over this period either. What pandemic, turn off your TV would be my advice
@MarcusS53441297 @swanblack404 It’s a cold, keep up covidiot
